testsuite.name: 집합과 정렬 테스트

testcase.name: 기본적으로 count, sum, avg, max, min 등을 지원한다.

testsuite.system-out:
Hibernate:
drop table Member if exists Hibernate:
drop table ORDERS if exists Hibernate:
drop table Product if exists Hibernate:
drop table Team if exists Hibernate:
create table Member ( id bigint generated by default as identity, age integer not null, name varchar(255), team_id bigint, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table ORDERS ( id bigint generated by default as identity, city varchar(255), street varchar(255), zipcode varchar(255), orderAmount integer not null, product_id bigint, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table Product ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(255), price integer not null, stockAmount integer not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table Team ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(255), primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
alter table Member add constraint FK5nt1mnqvskefwe0nj9yjm4eav foreign key (team_id) references Team Hibernate:
alter table ORDERS add constraint FK5bh03ntvefpobkk6oum8h2b7p foreign key (product_id) references Product Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.Member */ insert into Member (id, age, name, team_id) values (null, ?, ?, ?) Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.Member */ insert into Member (id, age, name, team_id) values (null, ?, ?, ?) Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.Member */ insert into Member (id, age, name, team_id) values (null, ?, ?, ?) Hibernate: /* select m from Member as m order by m.age DESC */ select member0_.id as id1_0_, member0_.age as age2_0_, member0_.name as name3_0_, member0_.team_id as team_id4_0_ from Member member0_ order by member0_.age DESC Hibernate:
drop table Member if exists Hibernate:
drop table ORDERS if exists Hibernate:
drop table Product if exists Hibernate:
drop table Team if exists Hibernate:
drop table Member if exists Hibernate:
drop table ORDERS if exists Hibernate:
drop table Product if exists Hibernate:
drop table Team if exists Hibernate:
create table Member ( id bigint generated by default as identity, age integer not null, name varchar(255), team_id bigint, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table ORDERS ( id bigint generated by default as identity, city varchar(255), street varchar(255), zipcode varchar(255), orderAmount integer not null, product_id bigint, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table Product ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(255), price integer not null, stockAmount integer not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table Team ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(255), primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
alter table Member add constraint FK5nt1mnqvskefwe0nj9yjm4eav foreign key (team_id) references Team Hibernate:
alter table ORDERS add constraint FK5bh03ntvefpobkk6oum8h2b7p foreign key (product_id) references Product Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.Member */ insert into Member (id, age, name, team_id) values (null, ?, ?, ?) Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.Member */ insert into Member (id, age, name, team_id) values (null, ?, ?, ?) Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.Member */ insert into Member (id, age, name, team_id) values (null, ?, ?, ?) Hibernate: /* select COUNT(m) from Member as m */ select count(member0_.id) as col_0_0_ from Member member0_ Hibernate: /* select SUM(m.age) from Member as m */ select sum(member0_.age) as col_0_0_ from Member member0_ Hibernate: /* select AVG(m.age) from Member as m */ select avg(cast(member0_.age as double)) as col_0_0_ from Member member0_ Hibernate: /* select MAX(m.age) from Member as m */ select max(member0_.age) as col_0_0_ from Member member0_ Hibernate: /* select MIN(m.age) from Member as m */ select min(member0_.age) as col_0_0_ from Member member0_ Hibernate:
drop table Member if exists Hibernate:
drop table ORDERS if exists Hibernate:
drop table Product if exists Hibernate:
drop table Team if exists
